snippet: As institutional investors pull back, individual investors need more warning and protection.
abstract: Editorial contends that falling quality and rising risk of junk bonds illustrate gaps in investor protection and revive concerns about how private equity owners of companies that issue bonds are using that money; warns that such risky business has tendency of blowing up eventually, if left unchecked.
lead_paragraph: As institutional investors pull back, individual investors need more warning and protection.

headline.seo: The Junk Is Back in Junk Bonds
headline.main: The Junk Is Back in Junk Bonds
headline.print_headline: The Junk Is Back in Junk Bonds

keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
